items.summary: Ensure the Lobby page always triggers the initial unfiltered chatroom fetch (React Query key ['chatrooms']) automatically on first page load once the backend actor becomes available, without requiring the user to click/tap a category filter.

Prevent React Query from serving stale/incorrect empty results caused by empty/whitespace search/category variants by ensuring that empty search/category states resolve to the canonical ['chatrooms'] cache key and that any legacy empty-filter cache entries are removed/ignored before rendering the lobby list.

Harden Lobby loading/error rendering so the page cannot get stuck showing the loading spinner indefinitely; when fetching fails, the user must see a clear error state with a working Retry action that triggers the correct refetch for the currently active (unfiltered/search/category) query.
